t: Why Buying a Bike Helmet Online Could Be Dangerous via @ConsumerReports
s: Be especially wary of “too good to be true” deals on legitimate helmets—if, say, an unfamiliar seller is offering a $200 helmet for $20. Andrew Love, head of brand security for Specialized Bicycle Components, says counterfeit versions of legitimate helmets are commonly offered for sale online.
